page.title: 14BLACKHILLS
page.content:
My name is Jason Leighton and I live at {Blackhills.}I go to { {Bishopston Comprehensive School}and I'm in the second year. It is a nice school and everybody's very friendly. Where I live there are lots of beautiful flowers and countryside. The people of 1985 are facing drugs, unemployment, and other problems. The nearest place to where I live is { {Bishopston.}It is a nice small village with a couple of shops but it's getting bigger all the time. Technology is now a big thing and nearly everybody has a computer. By 2000 technology will be taking over. It is very nice around here. A good home, a good school and really friendly people. I hope this will go on for a long time to come.
JASON LEIGHTON
